# removeCamera(id:)

**Instance Method**

Removes an immersive camera definition from the venue descriptor.

## Declaration

```swift
final func removeCamera(id: String) throws
```

## Parameters

- **id**: The ID of the camera being removed.

## Configuring cameras

- **cameras**: An array of all the immersive cameras contained in the venue descriptor.
- **addCamera(_:)**: Adds a new immersive camera definition to the venue descriptor.
- **cameraViewModel(for:)**: Returns the camera view model for the given immersive camera identifier.
